summary: TAKATA RECALL.  IT HAS BEEN OVER 1 YEAR SINCE THE RECEIPT OF THE RECALL NOTICE FOR THIS VEHICLE.  THE NHTSA WEBSITE SAYS TO FILE A REPORT IF THE MANUFACTURER HAS FAILED TO REMEDY THE PROBLEM "IN A TIMELY MANNER".  HOW MUCH TIME MUST PASS BEFORE A "NOT IN A TIMELY MANNER"  THRESHOLD IS REACHED?
